servinfo.title: Mass Air Flow (MAF) & Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Mass Air Flow (MAF) & Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection:N32A

attention2.ptxt: When servicing MAF & IAT sensor, be sure to observe the following items.

item.ptxt: Do not disassemble MAF & IAT sensor.
Do not expose MAF & IAT sensor to any shock. If it has been dropped, it should be replaced.
Do not clean MAF & IAT sensor.
Do not blow compressed air using air gun or the like.
Do not put finger or any other object into MAF & IAT sensor.

s1.ptxt: Remove MAF & IAT sensor (1) from air cleaner case (2).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Mass Air Flow (MAF) & Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:N32A

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten MAF & IAT sensor screws (1) to specified torque.
